equilibrium.time_slice[:].boundary.ovali.documentation: Ovality of the plasma boundary [MXH c1]

equilibrium.time_slice[:].boundary.strik.documentation: Shortest distance beween the flux surface with the strike point and the last closed flux surface

equilibrium.time_slice[:].boundary.tilt.documentation: Tilt of the plasma boundary [MXH c0]

equilibrium.time_slice[:].boundary.trian.documentation: Triangularity of the plasma boundary [MXH sin(s1)]

equilibrium.time_slice[:].boundary.twist.documentation: Twist of the plasma boundary [MXH c2]

equilibrium.time_slice[:].boundary_secon.documentation: Shortest distance beween the flux surface with the strike point and the last closed flux surface

equilibrium.time_slice[:].boundary_separ.documentation: Shortest distance beween the flux surface with the strike point and the last closed flux surface

equilibrium.time_slice[:].global_quantit.documentation: Vacuum toroidal field at R0 [T]; Positive sign means anti-clockwise when viewing from above. The product R0B0 must be consistent with the b_tor_vacuum_r field of the tf IDS.
Reference major radius where the vacuum toroidal magnetic field is given (usually a fixed position such as the middle of the vessel at the equatorial midplane)
